original_definition: 'manual FRR full activation time' means the time period between the setpoint change and the corresponding activation or deactivation of manual FRR;
generated_definition: 'manual FRR full activation time' means the time required to manually activate the frr system in case of a failure, determined by the lfc block tsos and not exceeding the time to restore frequency.

Article 3: ‘manual FRR full activation time’ means the time period between the setpoint change and the corresponding activation or deactivation of manual FRR;
Article 157: all TSOs of a LFC block shall determine the ratio of automatic FRR, manual FRR, the automatic FRR full activation time and manual FRR full activation time in order to comply with the requirement of paragraph (b). For that purpose, the automatic FRR full activation time of a LFC block and the manual FRR full activation time of the LFC block shall not be more than the time to restore frequency;
Article 158: a FRR providing unit or FRR providing group for manual FRR shall be capable of activating its complete manual reserve capacity on FRR within the manual FRR full activation time;
